sentences.sentence: And they have the spirally rising character.
sentences.translation: 并具有螺旋式上升的特征。

sentences.sentence: The foremast bands spirally wound. I used forged brass wire.
sentences.translation: 前桅螺旋带伤痕。我用铜线锻造。

sentences.sentence: Some manufacturers set the process up to wind some of the fibers spirally.
sentences.translation: 一些厂商设置的过程中最多风的一些纤维螺旋。
